title: Biden’s $2 trillion infrastructure plan | Today, Explained in 10
description:
It’s infrastructure week in America. President Joe Biden unveiled a plan to spend trillions on bridges, roads, housing, and clean energy to prove it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Biden’s $2 trillion infrastructure plan | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: The plan would pay for a lot more than just roads and bridges. It also includes funding for long-term care and manufacturing.
itunes:summary:
